response_parsed.title: Implementing Machine Learning Training Loops Using FastAPI with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a step-by-step explanation on how to implement machine learning (ML) training loops using FastAPI, a modern web framework for building APIs, and Python 3.12+. The tutorial covers the setup, creating an API endpoint, handling data, ML model implementation, and training loop.
key_points: Install necessary packages: FastAPI, Uvicorn, Pandas, Scikit-learn, and TensorFlow (or PyTorch for deep learning)
Define an API endpoint to handle data requests
Implement data preprocessing and feature engineering as necessary
Choose and initialize an ML model using Scikit-learn or TensorFlow
Set up the training loop with data iteration, model fitting, evaluation metrics calculation, and model saving/updating (if needed)
Test the API endpoint by sending data and checking model predictions
